verses.text: PEA ‘i he ‘osi ‘a e lotu ‘a Solomone, na‘e hifo ha afi mei langi, ‘o keina ‘a e feilaulau-mōifua, mo e ngaahi feilaulau: pea na‘e fonu ‘a e fale ‘i he kolōlia ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Pea na‘e ‘ikai lava ‘a e kau taula‘eiki ke hū ki he fale ‘o Sihova, he kuo fakafonu ‘e he kolōlia ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘a e fale ‘o e ‘Eiki.

Pea na‘e mamata ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli kātoa, ‘i he hifo ‘a e afi, mo e toka ‘a e kolōlia ‘o e ‘Eiki ki he fale; pea na‘a nau fakafo‘ohifo ki he faliki, ‘o nau hū, ‘o nau fai ‘enau fakafeta‘ia ‘a Sihova, “He ‘oku lelei ia. ‘Oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.”
Pea ko e tu‘i mo e kakai kotoa na‘a nau lavaki fai feilaulau ki he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Pea feia ‘e Kingi Solomone ha feilaulau pulu ko e toko ua mano mā ua afe, mo e sipi ‘e taha kilu mā ua mano. Ko hono huufi ē ‘o e fale ‘o ‘Elohimi ‘e he tu‘i mo e kakai kotoa.

Pea lavaki tu‘u ‘a e kau taula‘eiki ‘i he fai honau lakanga; ko e kau Līvai foki mo e nāunau-hiva ‘a e ‘Eiki, ‘a ia ne ngaohi ‘e Kingi Tēvita ke fai‘aki ‘a e fakafeta‘i kia Sihova (“He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa”), ‘i he fakafai ‘iate kinautolu ‘e Tēvita ‘ene fakamālō: mo e kau taula‘eiki na‘e lavaki ifi talupite ‘i he mata ‘otu; pea lavaki tu‘u pē ‘a ‘Isileli kātoa.

Pea na‘e tapui ‘e Solomone ‘a e loto‘ā kotoa na‘e ‘i he mata fale ‘o e ‘Eiki; he na‘a ne feia ai ‘a e ngaahi feilaulau-mōifua, mo e ngako ‘o e ngaahi feilaulau-‘ofa: he ko e ‘ōlita palasa ne ngaohi ‘e Solomone na‘e ‘ikai fe‘unga mo e feilaulau-mōifua, mo e feilaulau-me‘akai, mo e ngaahi ngako.
Pea fai ‘e Solomone ‘a e Kātoanga ‘i he taimi pē ko ia, ‘o ‘aho fitu, ‘e ia mo ‘Isileli kotoa; ko e fu‘u kātoanga kakai ‘aupito, ko e ha‘u mei he Hū‘anga ‘o Hēmati, ‘o a‘u ki he vaitafe ‘o ‘Isipite.
Pea ‘i hono ‘aho valu na‘a nau fai ‘a e Faka‘osi: he na‘a nau fai ‘a e huufi ‘o e ‘ōlita, ‘o ‘aho fitu, mo e kātoanga ‘o ‘aho fitu.

Pea ‘i hono ‘aho uofulu mā tolu ‘o e fitu‘i māhina na‘a ne tuku atu ‘a e kakai ke ō ki honau ngaahi tēniti, ‘oku nau fiefia, pea lelei honau loto ‘i he lelei kuo feia ‘e Sihova kia Tēvita pea kia Solomone, pea ki ‘Isileli ko hono kakai.
Pea faka‘osi ‘e Solomone ‘a e fale ‘o Sihova, mo e fale ‘o e tu‘i: pea ko e me‘a kotoa na‘e hā ki he loto ‘o Solomone ke fai ‘i he fale ‘o Sihova, mo hono fale ‘o‘ona, na‘a ne lava lelei.
Pea hā ‘a e ‘Eiki kia Solomone ‘i he pō, ‘o ne folofola mai, Kuo u ongo‘i ho‘o lotu, pea kuo u fili ‘a e potu ni mōku fale feilaulau‘anga.
Kapau te u tāpuni ‘a e langi ke ‘oua ‘e ‘uha, pe te u fekau ‘a e he‘e ke keina ‘a e fonua, pe te u tuku atu ‘a e mahaki faka‘auha ki hoku kakai:

kapau ‘e fakavaivai‘i kinautolu ‘e hoku kakai, ‘a ia ‘oku ui‘aki hoku hingoa, pea nau lotu, ‘o kumi ki hoku fōtunga, pea nau tafoki mei honau ngaahi ‘alunga kovi; pea te u toki ongo‘i ‘i langi, pea te u fakamolemole ‘enau angahala, mo faito‘o honau fonua.
Ko eni, ‘e ‘ā hoku mata, pea ‘e fakaongo hoku telinga ki ha lotu ‘e fai ‘i he potu ni.
He kuo u fili eni mo tapui ‘a e fale ni, ke tu‘u ai hoku hingoa ‘o ta‘engata: pea ‘e ‘i ai hoku mata mo hoku loto ma‘u ai pē.
Pea ko e me‘a kiate koe, kapau te ke taka ‘i hoku ‘ao ‘o hangē ko e fai ‘a ho‘o tamai ko Tēvita, mo ke fai hono kotoa ‘o e me‘a kuo u tu‘utu‘uni atu, ‘o tauhi ‘eku ngaahi fekau mo konisitūtone;
te u toki fakapapau ho taloni mo ho‘o pule, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku fuakava ki ho‘o tamai ko Tēvita, ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai hala hao tangata ke pule ki ‘Isileli.
Ka ‘o kapau te mou tafoki, ‘o li‘aki ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni mo fekau, ‘a ia kuo u tuku ‘i homou ‘ao, ka mou ‘alu ‘o tauhi ‘otua kehe ‘o lotu ki ai:

pea te u toki ta‘aki fu‘u kinautolu mei he kelekele kuo u foaki kiate kinautolu; pea ko e fale ni, ‘a ia kuo u tapui ki hoku hingoa, te u li‘aki mei hoku ‘ao, pea te u tuku ke fakatokotokanaki ‘aki mo luma‘i ‘e he ngaahi kakai kotoa.
Pea ko e fale ni, ‘a ia ‘oku pehē fau hono mā‘olunga, ‘e ofo ai ‘e kinautolu kotoa pē ‘e ‘alu ai, pea te nau pehē, Ko e hā kuo fai pehē ai ‘e Sihova ki he fonua ni mo e fale ni?

Pea te nau tali, Koe‘uhi ā na‘a nau li‘aki ‘a Sihova ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘enau ngaahi kui, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘omi kinautolu mei ‘Isipite; ka nau piki ki he ngaahi ‘otua kehe, ‘o lotu ki ai mo tauhi ia: ko hono ō ia kuo ne ‘omi ai ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u kovi ni kiate kinautolu.
